faqs.question: What do I need to consider when applying?
faqs.answer: To apply to Zeppelin Power Systems, we need your CV. Cover letters and references are not mandatory. Please only apply online via our application portal.

faqs.question: What are the working hours at Zeppelin Power Systems?
faqs.answer: We offer different working time models - many employees work flexitime. We do not offer shift work.

faqs.question: What are the working hours at Zeppelin Power Systems?
faqs.answer: We offer different working time models - many employees work flexitime. We do not offer shift work.

faqs.question: Is there a home office or mobile working?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer mobile and flexible working - depending on the position and in consultation with the team.

faqs.question: What does Zeppelin Power Systems do?
faqs.answer: We are part of the Zeppelin Group and specialize in drive systems and energy systems - with a focus on sustainability and innovation.

faqs.question: What is the corporate culture like?
faqs.answer: As a foundation company, we act in a future-oriented, social and sustainable manner. Team spirit, diversity and safety are at the heart of what we do.

faqs.question: I don't fulfill all the requirements - should I still apply?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Even if you don't meet 100% of the requirements, we look forward to receiving your application. Motivation and personality are just as important to us as experience.

faqs.question: Where can I find the requirements for the position?
faqs.answer: You can find the requirements directly in the respective job advertisement on our website.

faqs.question: Is the position also suitable for career starters?
faqs.answer: Many of our positions are also suitable for career starters - take a look at the respective advertisement or send us an unsolicited application.

faqs.question: What development opportunities do I have?
faqs.answer: Grow with Zeppelin: We offer you extensive training opportunities - individual and practical.

faqs.question: Are there internal training courses?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer internal trainings, impulse series and learning formats - tailored to your role and interests.

faqs.question: How many vacation days do I have?
faqs.answer: With us, you get 30 days' vacation per year - plus special leave on certain occasions.

faqs.question: Is there a job ticket?
faqs.answer: We do not currently offer a job ticket - but we do offer many other attractive social benefits.

faqs.question: What additional benefits do you offer?
faqs.answer: You will receive capital-forming benefits, a company pension scheme, a share in the company's profits and many other benefits.

faqs.question: What is Z FIT?
faqs.answer: Z FIT is our health initiative - with themed weeks, sporting team events and the possibility to lease a company bike.

faqs.question: What does Z COLOURFUL mean?
faqs.answer: Z COLOURFUL stands for our diversity initiative - with impulse series, networks and targeted inclusion measures.

faqs.question: How do you support work-life balance?
faqs.answer: We offer mobile working, flexible models and advice on all aspects of family and career.

faqs.question: What do you do for sustainability?
faqs.answer: Our sustainability strategy includes CO2 reduction, waste avoidance and life cycle management - for a sustainable working environment.

faqs.question: How safe is my workplace?
faqs.answer: As a foundation company, we offer you a permanent employment contract and long-term prospects.

faqs.question: What happens to my data?
faqs.answer: Your data will be processed in accordance with GDPR, treated confidentially and only used for the application process.

faqs.question: Can I send an unsolicited application?
faqs.answer: Yes, unsolicited applications are welcome! Just tell us which area you see yourself in.

faqs.question: How does the application process work?
faqs.answer: Once we have received your application, we will check your documents and get back to you as soon as possible. This may be followed by an initial interview and further steps - depending on the position.

faqs.question: How long will it take to hear back from me?
faqs.answer: As a rule, you will receive initial feedback from us within 7 days.

faqs.question: Can I change my application at a later date?
faqs.answer: If you would like to add anything, please contact our recruiting team - we will be happy to help you.

faqs.question: What documents are required?
faqs.answer: We need your CV. A cover letter and references are optional.
